title: Skin Idea for Rakan & Xayah
body:
I had an idea for some skins for Rakan{{champion:497}}  and Xayah{{champion:498}} . It was to have a fire/ice theme to them, so like a fire rakan and ice xayah. So Rakan's Gleaming Quill could be like a fireball, his grad entrance could look similar to brand's Pillar of Flame, his Battle Dance could give a flaming sheild, and The Quickness could have him covered in flames. With Xayah her feathers could be like ice shards and her Deadly Plumage could give her an icy surround.
With their recall they could look like the photo in the link provided but having them circling.
https://www.google.com.au/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fbeamingnotes.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F08%2Fmaxresdefault-2.jpg&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fbeamingnotes.com%2F2016%2F08%2F15%2Ffire-and-ice-by-robert-frost-summary%2F&docid=LQDn0CP3DTrlHM&tbnid=S3VAxDg2FL8mOM%3A&vet=10ahUKEwj9-9S4jNDTAhWMxbwKHWe8CbsQMwhHKBIwEg..i&w=1920&h=1080&bih=954&biw

replies.body: A more fun idea for a skin, Kitty Cat Xayah and Alpha Cat Rakan. Their ears support the cat theme, but would still have their looks, where they are half human and part animal. Xayah and Rakan "feathers" could be yarn. Rakan CC could be a ponce and jump. i'd just like to see paws instead of claws. Xayah could be calico and Rakan could be orange tabby.
